name: Slow Down (Elvis L)
description:
A game made for #MiniLD63

This is an unfinished little game that was made for the Mini Ludum Dare 63. The goal is to go through the levels to get the hourglass while avoiding things that kills you, you can also slow down the speed of the level except your own speed. 

Controls:

Arrows/WASD to move 

Z/Space to Jump

Up arrow to enter level

Shift to slow down time
